Know this is an early / beta issue, but thought it may be good to jot down for record sake, in case somebody else encounters the problem...

I'm running 64bit Ubuntu 14.04 LTS Beta 2. I added the dartcore PPA and installed necessary build dependencies
content.old:

issue.title: Gazebo 3.0 prerelease builds on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS but segfaults on start
